hero.name: Hidan
hero.specialAbility:
Death Controlling Possessed Blood If you have dealt damage by card with ⎊ and the target of the attack - still alive, activate Curse.
Immortality: At the beginning of each turn, restore 2 health if your deck is not empty.

cards.title: Shiji Hyōketsu
cards.basicText: If you have damaged an opponent with a marked card since your previous turn, activate The CURSE ⎊ on one of those who took damage.

cards.title: Sacrifice ⎊
cards.basicText:
Deal 10 damage to yourself.
If any opponent was killed by this card and opponent has self health counter - recovery full health.

cards.title: Bukijutsu ⎊
cards.afterText: Draw 1 card. If you win the combat draw 2 card instead.

cards.title: satisfaction
cards.afterText: Restore health for all damage taken. Draw 1 card.

cards.title: For the Jashin
cards.afterText: Take any 1 card from the discard pile.

cards.title: Tornado slash
cards.duringText: Deal 2 damage to everyone on your adjacent cells.

cards.title: Jump punch ⎊
cards.immediateText: Move to other space around the target if it possible.

cards.title: Puncture ⎊
cards.afterText: If you win combat - draw one card.

cards.title: Scythe throw ⎊
cards.afterText: If you lose combat - move  by one space.

cards.title: counter punch ⎊
cards.afterText: Deal damage in return equal to the opponent's card boost value.

cards.title: Momentous Shift
cards.duringText: If your fighter started this turn in a different space, this card's value is 5 instead.

cards.title: Swift Strike
cards.afterText: Move your fighter up to 4 spaces.

cards.title: prayer
cards.basicText: Place this card near, your next attack has double damage. Can't use on damage yourself.

cards.title: annoyance
cards.basicText:
Be sure to move towards your nearest opponent by 1 space. 
Gain 1 action. Draw 2 cards.

ruleCards.content:
Activation: place one markers ⎊ on the target 's card and on your space. 
Now you: 
▹When stand on the ⎊ , all damage received is also dealt to the marked opponent.
▹Can use cards with ⎊ at any distance if you standing on space with ⎊, If the opponent is not on the adjacent square, he can't use the cards for defence.
ruleCards.title: Curse ⎊
